text:
It was a pleasant experience dining there with family.
Lovely decor ,specious hall with comfortable chair.
Cutlery good
Cleanliness good
Food excellent
Mala hot pot,
Aluve fried rice too testy
Wash room wet ,be careful
Approach from street easy
Great place! Pick your noodles, veggies & spice level. It‚Äôs so spicy so be mindful :) taste is so goooodddd! We had medium spicy & it was ü•µ Mala hot pot is awesome! One pot is good to share
Best veg mala in SG!!! Always worth the time travelling down :) must try the ‚Äúfish‚Äù and lime juice w plum too. Not to mention the shark fin soup taste different too!

The Mala Xiang Guo and Shark's Fin soup are nice, above average. Definitely not the best in Sg. As for the Oatmeal Tofu is tasteless. The environment is quite comfortable, but the service is......!  Overall,quite nice restaurant for vegetarian. But the prices are higher than other vege restaurants in Town areas.

Went with my family to celebrate my uncle‚Äôs birthday, knowing the food here is always great. I also appreciated that they helped store the birthday cake in their freezer before our dinner. My favorite dish of the evening was the È¶ôËæ£ÁÉ§Á¥†È±º‚Äîabsolutely delicious! üëçüèª

That said, I‚Äôm giving 4 stars due to the lack of customer service. We wanted to take some nice group photos to commemorate the gathering and asked one of the servers for help. To make it easier, I angled the camera to minimise the appearance of the un-cleared dishes on our table, but the server took the photos hastily without even a 3-2-1 countdown or effort to adjust the angle. The photos turned out cluttered with dishes in the background, and when I politely asked for a retake, she showed visible impatience.

When we asked her to take another photo using my uncle‚Äôs phone, she rushed through it again, glancing toward the kitchen and making us feel like a burden. The entire process would have taken only 2‚Äì3 minutes, yet her attitude left a disappointing impression‚Äîespecially considering we spent over $230 here and specifically chose this place to celebrate a special occasion.

While I understand the staff were busy, good customer service includes helping guests capture their moments. A little effort in taking nice photos wouldn‚Äôt hurt and could even encourage positive posts on social media. Unfortunately, the server‚Äôs impatience and lack of care resulted in unflattering photos that couldn‚Äôt be shared. I hope the restaurant can improve this aspect of their service.

TLDR: food is great but customer service is lacking.
